summary: A mental hospital somewhere in Tuscany during the thirties. Far away from fascism, this closed world is rules over by Dr. Bonaccorsi, a passionate benevolent psychiatrist whose dream is to ... See full summary »
cast: Marcello Mastroianni|Françoise Fabian|Marthe Keller|Barbara Bouchet|Pierre Blaise|Maria Teresa Albani|Maria Michi|Paolo Pacino|Silvano Tranquilli|Charles Fawcett|Enzo Robutti|Ferruccio De Ceresa|Lucia Bosè|Adriana Asti|Paola Corazzi|Alessandra Cardini|Benedetta Valabrega|Clara Algranti|Adriana Falco|Guerrino Crivello|Marne Maitland|Noemi Biseo Greenberg|Palmira Zaccardi|Nerina Montagnani|Sergio Di Giulio|Franca Scagnetti
title: Por las antiguas escaleras
